generic.description: Initial exposure and startup speed settings

warmStartUp.description: Warm Start Up loads uses exposure settings from previous camera session (if available) as the first exposure for new session

startExpIndexRangePct.description: Percentage of the exposure index table range that can be used as a start index when using warm startup. If exposure index from previous session falls outside of this range it will be clipped into range

fastAEC.description: Tuning settings for initial convergence algorithms: FastAEC and AggressiveAEC

enableStartUpBias.description: Enable biasing to converge faster in the first frame in the presence of saturated regions

firstFrameStepSizeDarkMax.description: When converging from dark to bright: maximum absolute exposure index step size for first frame

stepSizeBrightAdjRange.description: When converging from bright to dark: Exposure index step size range within which a factor will be applied to converge faster in the first frame

maxAdjFactor.description: Max factor to boost exposure adjustment in the first frame

tolMultUnitStepSize.description: Tolerance expressed as a multiple of unitStepSize

frameSkip.description: How many frames to skip between two adjustments. Depends on sensor sync

minSettledCount.description: How many frames without any adjustments before declaring the algorithm is settled

maxFrameConvTimeOut.description: Maximum duration of convergence, in frames
